titles.title: Recognizing Interscholastic Athletic Administrators' Day on December 14, 2021.
Recognizing Interscholastic Athletic Administrators' Day on December 14, 2021.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
This resolution supports the annual recognition of Interscholastic Athletic Administrators' Day.
In addition, the resolution commends (1) athletic administrators for their commitment to secondary school student athletes, and (2) the National Interscholastic Athletic Administrators Association for providing continuous learning and preparation to athletic administrators.
